name: HR
samplePrompt: Write a job description using selected context.

chunks.title: Role Overview
chunks.body: This role designs and maintains our people programs and data integrity.

chunks.title: Inclusion Guidelines
chunks.body: Avoid gendered terms, ensure ADA compliance, emphasize equal opportunity.

chunks.title: Compensation Bands
chunks.body: Transparent ranges, geographic adjustments, total rewards philosophy.

chunks.title: Interview Process
chunks.body: Structured interviews with rubrics, panel diversity, timely feedback.

chunks.title: Benefits
chunks.body: Health, mental wellness stipend, learning budget, flexible time-off.
